title: Table Wrapper Box
summary: The Table Wrapper Box is the box generated around table grid boxes which accounts for the space needed for any caption displayed for the table. This box will become the containing block for absolutely positioned items where the table is the containing block.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
